sect2.title: System Administration
sect2.para: GNOME &version; provides some new features for system administration.

sect3.title: System Tools
sect3.para: The system tools allow you to configure your system clock and your network connection, as well as manage the users and groups on your system. At present, these system tools are most appropriate for single computers rather than large networks of computers.

GNOME &version; delivers some improvements, including
Networking: Improved wireless support (WEP and ESSID detection), and ISDN connections.
Users and Groups: Easier editing of group members.
Changes are applied instantly where appropriate.

sect3.title: Log Viewer
sect3.para:
The GNOME log viewer has added a handy find feature, and an improved monitor mode. In addition, it can now
Open multiple logs in the separate windows.
Open archived logs and logs on networked drives.
Copy logs to the clipboard.
